verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ׀ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לְעֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> [Tle-'E-vedthe servant יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid [A Psalm] of David אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who דִּבֶּ֨ר׀ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber who spake לַיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּ֭בְרֵי <S%H1697><s%> Div-rei the words הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <S%H7892><s%> hash-shi-Rah of this song הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; in בְּי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day הִֽצִּיל־ <S%H5337><s%> hitz-tzil- delivered יְהוָ֘ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [that] the LORD אוֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> mik-Kaf him from the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vav, of all his enemies וּמִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> u-mi-Yad and from the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul. of Saul וַיֹּאמַ֡ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar And he said אֶרְחָמְךָ֖ <S%H7355><s%> 'er-cha-me-Cha I will love יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh thee O LORD חִזְקִֽי׃ <S%H2391><s%> chiz-Ki. my strength

[and] my high tower
